short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick links to Ebay, Paypal, Amazon websites for easy use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking this extension, you will see links to...

eBay.com
My Account
Watchlist
Wishlist
Cart
Active Items
Sold Items
Messages
Purchase History

Summary
Activity
Transfer
Wallet
Deals

Amazon.com
My Account
Lists
Cart
Order History
Amazon Smile

This extension is not affiliated with eBay, PayPal, or Amazon, and is to be used in conjunction with the aforementioned companies' websites.

If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions, fell free to email me at miachrome.rr@gmail.com and thank you for viewing my extension!
